var template_contents_container = document.getElementById("{{ content_key }}-container"); var url = "{% url 'get_template_content_form_fields' request.app.uid localized_template_content.id content_key %}"; $.get(url, function(html){ $(template_contents_container).html(html); ajaxify(template_contents_container.id); $(".move-component-up").on("click", positionmanager.onMoveForward); $(".move-component-down").on("click", positionmanager.onMoveBack); }); reloadPreview();
